{'is_id': 'example-video-id', 'show_slug.response: The API retrieves detailed information about the movie show identified by the slug 'example-show-slug' and the specific video ID 'example-video-id'. This may include metadata such as the title, description, cast, release date, duration, genre, and streaming availability. The data can be used to display the movie's details to users or provide options for playback within the video-on-demand app.
